range: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity (W); Approx. 1.5 m (5 ft) to infinity (T)
continuousshots: Continuous H:120 fps (50 frames are captured at a speed of about 1/120 seconds or faster);  Continuous L (about 31 pictures are continuously shot at a rate of about 1.9 fps)
shootingmodes: Auto, Scene auto selector, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Fireworks show, Black and white copy, Easy panorama, Pet portrait, 3D photography)
